title: Geochemistry, health risk assessment and statistical source identification of dissolved trace elements in surface water of the Chishui River, China
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00740E, Paper
Xiwei Song, Liqiang Chao, Xutao Jiang, Kejia Liu, Xunchi Pu
As the most famous wine industry area in China, the concentration of dissolved trace elements (DTEs) in surface water of the Chishui River has attracted attention.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
